availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Fountain Riddle Collins (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Reuben Collins and Mary Collins. Married to Sarah Elizabeth Webster Collins in Grant County, Kentucky on January 29, 1851. Father of Arthusa L. Collins, Reubin Samuel Collins, Albert B. Collins, William S. Collins, and James P. Collins. Farmer in Grant County in 1860. Registered for the Union Draft in Grant County, Kentucky in December 1863.

ab.bibl:
